segments.text: Hi . Steven . I just drop in and want to have a chat with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , so nice of you to come here . Have a seat . Please make yourself at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . ( Sit on the sofa ) Wow ! Your house was decorated so beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . My wife would be very happy to hear this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She must have done a lot of work on it .
segments.speaker: S2
